statements: SELECT * FROM early_childhood_education_certification;
SELECT teacher_name, certification_type FROM early_childhood_education_certification WHERE certification_date = '2021-10-15';
SELECT id, certification_type, training_completed FROM early_childhood_education_certification WHERE teacher_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT certification_type, teacher_name, certification_date FROM early_childhood_education_certification WHERE training_completed = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM early_childhood_education_certification WHERE certification_type = 'Advanced';
SELECT * FROM early_childhood_education_certification WHERE certification_type = 'Montessori' AND training_completed = TRUE;
SELECT teacher_name, certification_type, certification_date FROM early_childhood_education_certification WHERE certification_date < '2022-01-01' ORDER BY certification_date DESC;
SELECT teacher_name, certification_type FROM early_childhood_education_certification WHERE training_completed = FALSE ORDER BY teacher_name ASC;
SELECT COUNT(id) AS total_certifications FROM early_childhood_education_certification WHERE certification_type LIKE '%Education%' GROUP BY certification_type;
SELECT * FROM early_childhood_education_certification WHERE certification_date BETWEEN '2020-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM certification_records;
SELECT certification_id, certification_name FROM certification_records WHERE teacher_id = 1;
SELECT certification_id, certification_name FROM certification_records ORDER BY certification_date DESC;
SELECT training_topic, training_date FROM training_records WHERE staff_id = 2;
SELECT certification_name, certification_date FROM certification_records WHERE certification_id = 3;
SELECT certification_name, certification_date FROM certification_records WHERE teacher_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM training_records WHERE staff_id = 5 ORDER BY training_date DESC;
SELECT certification_name, certification_date FROM certification_records WHERE teacher_id = 3 AND certification_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT training_topic, training_date FROM training_records WHERE staff_id = 2 ORDER BY training_date ASC;
SELECT certification_name, certification_date FROM certification_records WHERE teacher_id = 4 AND certification_date BETWEEN '2019-01-01' AND '2020-01-01';
SELECT * FROM certification_records;
SELECT certification_type, issue_date FROM certification_records WHERE expiration_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT staff_name, staff_role FROM staff_records ORDER BY hire_date DESC;
SELECT training_name, training_provider, completion_date FROM training_records WHERE completion_date IS NOT NULL;
SELECT certification_type, issue_date, expiration_date FROM certification_records WHERE expiration_date < '2023-01-01';
SELECT * FROM certification_records WHERE certification_type='Online Course' ORDER BY issue_date DESC;
SELECT staff_name, staff_role FROM staff_records WHERE hire_date >= '2021-01-01' AND hire_date <= '2021-12-31';
SELECT certification_type, issue_date, expiration_date FROM certification_records WHERE expiration_date < CURRENT_DATE;
SELECT certification_id, certification_type, issue_date FROM certification_records WHERE certification_type LIKE 'Cert%';
SELECT training_name, training_provider, completion_date FROM training_records WHERE completion_date BETWEEN '2020-01-01' AND '2020-12-31';
SELECT * FROM Certification;
SELECT certification_name, issue_date FROM Certification;
SELECT educator_id, first_name, last_name FROM Educator ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM TrainingRecord WHERE hours_completed > 10;
SELECT staff_id, first_name, last_name, position FROM Staff WHERE position = 'Manager';
SELECT * FROM Certification;
SELECT certification_name, issue_date FROM Certification WHERE issue_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT Educator.first_name, Educator.last_name, Certification.certification_name FROM Educator LEFT JOIN Certification ON Educator.certification_id = Certification.certification_id;
SELECT * FROM TrainingRecord WHERE training_type = 'Workshop' ORDER BY training_date DESC;

SELECT Staff.first_name, Staff.last_name, TrainingRecord.training_type FROM Staff JOIN Educator ON Staff.staff_id = Educator.educator_id JOIN TrainingRecord ON Educator.educator_id = TrainingRecord.educator_id ORDER BY Staff.last_name, TrainingRecord.training_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM teachers;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM staff;
SELECT DISTINCT certification_name, certification_org FROM certifications;
SELECT teacher_id, first_name, last_name, certification_date FROM teacher_certifications;
SELECT * FROM staff_trainings ORDER BY training_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM teachers WHERE teacher_id = 1;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM staff WHERE hire_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT teacher_id, certification_name, certification_date FROM teacher_certifications WHERE teacher_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM certifications WHERE certification_duration > 12;
SELECT staff_id, training_name, training_date FROM staff_trainings ORDER BY training_date DESC;
